joinServer.title: heya! amina here.
joinServer.description:
thanks for inviting me to {server}.

**what i can do:**
- moderation and safety
- fun commands and games
- economy and music
- and more

**important:** run `/admin` to configure me.

need help? join the support server.

joinDM.title: hey {user}!
joinDM.description:
thanks for inviting me to {server}!

to get started, run `/settings` in your server.

i can help with:
- moderation and safety
- fun commands
- economy and music
- and more

leaveDM.title: hey {user}
leaveDM.description:
just wanted to say thanks for having me in {server}.

if something went wrong, let me know. feedback helps.

maybe we can try again sometime?

setup.title: mina setup
setup.description: let's make your server super awesome! click the button below to set up important stuff

success.title: yay! setup complete!
success.description: we did it! your server is now super awesome and ready to go
success.footer: thanks for setting me up! let's have fun together
success.testDescription: hi everyone! this channel is now set up for mina's updates. stay tuned for awesome announcements!

error.notFound: couldn't find that channel or role. can you double-check the names?
error.noPermission: i don't have permission to send messages in that channel. can you give me the right permissions?
error.invalidTime: that's not a valid number of minutes. can you try again?
error.remindSuccess: okie dokie! i'll remind you to finish the setup in {minutes} minutes~

reminder.title: mina setup reminder
reminder.description: hey there! just a friendly reminder to finish setting me up in your server. run `/settings` to get started!
reminder.footer: i can't wait to be fully operational and super awesome in your server!

reload.title: command reload
reload.description:
reload commands, events, or contexts

**select what to reload:**
**commands** - reload all slash commands
**events** - reload all event handlers
**contexts** - reload all context menus
**all** - reload everything

**note:** this will reload the specified modules from disk.
